mapper.select: select * from goodsinfo order by goodsnum desc
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWCNT , a.* FROM goodsinfo a ORDER BY a.regdate DESC ) b WHERE b.ROWCNT <= 5
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (goodsNum, id, repNum, repContents) values (#{goodsNum}, #{id}, reply_seq.nextval, #{repContents})
insert into cart (cartNum, id, goodsNum, cartStock,goodsSize) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{goodsNum}, #{cartStock},#{goodsSize})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.id, c.goodsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.goodsName, g.goodsPrice, g.goodsThumbImage, c.goodsSize from cart c inner join goodsinfo g on c.goodsNum = g.goodsNum where c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into orderinfo(orderId, id, orderRec, address , orderTel, amount,email,name,ordermessage,goodsName) values(#{orderId}, #{id}, #{orderRec}, #{address}, #{orderTel}, #{amount},#{email},#{name},#{orderMessage},#{goodsName})
insert into order_details(orderDetailsNum, orderId, goodsNum, cartStock) select order_details_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, goodsNum, cartStock from cart
mapper.select: select orderId, id, orderRec,address, orderTel, amount,orderDate,goodsName,delivery from orderinfo where id = #{id}

select o.orderId, o.id, o.orderRec, o.address, o.orderTel, o.amount, o.orderDate,o.delivery, d.orderDetailsNum, d.goodsNum, d.cartStock, g.goodsName, g.goodsThumbImage, g.goodsPrice from orderinfo o inner join order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join goodsinfo g on d.goodsNum = g.goodsNum where o.id = #{id} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
